name: Advanced Davis interface
description: owvision interface for the davis vantage pro 2 and vue.
author: open-weather-vision

baud_rate.message: Please enter your console's baud rate
baud_rate.description: This setting must match your console's settings.
baud_rate.name: Baud rate

rain_collector_size.message: Please enter your station's rain collector size
rain_collector_size.description: There are three different rain collector types. Please choose yours.
rain_collector_size.name: Rain collector size

serial_path.message: Please enter the serial connection path to your console
serial_path.description: The serial path defines the communication channel between owvision and your weather station console.
serial_path.name: Serial path
